(182)  sambandhangen husenta pahadili kirimak ! (182)  manawa himikam komisamen balapamak naha (182)  2015di wadima sancharakayan pamina aththe indiyawen ! (181)  punchi chandeta hela urumaya ejapayen..

krida katayuthu wenuwen da nawika ha sagarika widyapitaya wishala meheyak sidu karanu labayi, eeanuwa, tenis, mesa pandu, pa pandu, mushti prahara, malala krida, pihinum ha ridmayanukula wyayama (jimnastik), hoki ,badmintan, wolibol, pasipandu, golf, ragbi, skosh, krikat, dunu widima, ruwal oru ha padi yathra, ilakkayata wedi thabima, kaya wardhana wani kridawanwala niratha wima sadaha nawina pahasukamwalin samanwitha kridagara, krida piti saha pihinum thataka nawika ha sagarika widyapitaya sathuya.
makswadaya ee kele paksha nayakathwayakata, ehi di da awasana washayen gath kala pudgalayaku ge aadhipathyayakata, samajaya yata karamini.
eekabaddha bas meheyum madhyasthanayak athi karanawa.
awadhi konaya wishala konayakin hara - aawarana athuru muhunatha hamuwana kirana (athuru muhunathata lambha rekhawata sapekshawa maninu labayi) sampurnayenma parawarthanaya we.
pradhaniyage kamaraye athi wayusamikarana yanthraya itha hodin kriyakarana bawa ehi athi dadi sithenma pasak we.

rawith kasun samanga giye ambiyulans riyaduru mahathage niwasin thunapaha kudu saha miris kudu swalpayak ragena eemataya.me athara mamath akuwath kussiya perala lunu bhajanayakuth soya pakattuwaka ena rasakaraka pakattuwakuth soya gathimu.soya pakattuwe aa rasakaraka pakattuwa kal ikuth wu ekak dayi api dana sitiye natha.namuth eya kal ikuth nowu ekak bawa api dan danimu.chef rawith mahatha miriskudu, thunapaha kudu, lunu saha soya pakattuwe rasakarakaya dama ema nudls tika ka haki mattamata path kaleya.ee athara ohuge kuda molaye janitha wu nawa adahasak kriyathmaka kirimatada ohu pasubata nowiya.ee mese nawa rasakaraka ha ek kala nudlswalata manchi kume biskat ekathu kota balimaya.kuda kaliwalata kada ekkala biskat nudlswalata nawa jawayak ek kirimata samath wiya.rawi kedinaka ho waidyawarayeku lesa pitawi galkissa hotalaye pathwimak laba pabilis mahathawa upahasayata lakkarana aakaraya sihina mawamin api 'kume soya nudls' kawemu.
